title: Thil mak chhui sen loh kan Pathian
lyrics:
Thil mak chhui sen loh kan Pathian,
I thawh tinreng mak kantih hian;
Nimahse, i mi khawngaih hman,
Engkimah mak kan ti ber a.

Nangmah ang rengin tu nge awm?
Min ngaidam zelin min la lawm.

Sual rapthlak tak ngaidam tura,
Thiam loh hmin der hnu i zuah hi,
I thiltihtheihna a ni a,
Tu man chu chu an nei lo va.

Boral hnu hi lawma khurin,
Pathian ngaihdamna kan chang a;
Sual chhiar sen loh ngaihdamna kim,
Isua thisena lei tawh kha.

Aw, khawngaihna chhiar sen loh chu,
Pathian thiltih mak a ni a;
A faknain khawvel khat se,
Vana angel-ho zai nenin.
